Package model

Class CanvasResizer

java.lang.Object
model.CanvasResizer
public class CanvasResizer extends Object
CanvasResizer: Manages the resizing of a drawing canvas. This class facilitates the creation of a new canvas with a specified width and height, transferring the content from an existing canvas to the new one. It is used to resize the drawing canvas while preserving its content.
Version:
1.6
Author:
Hannibal, Doom Al Rajhi
